required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on May 29, 2018
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Promiseb Topical Cream for Cradle Cap
clinical_study.official_title: A Double Blind, Placebo-Controlled, Pilot Study to Estimate the Efficacy and Tolerability of Twice Daily Promiseb Topical Cream in Pediatric Subjects With Cradle Cap (Seborrheic Dermatitis)

brief_summary.textblock: The purpose of this study is to evaluate the efficacy and safety of Promiseb Topical Cream in cradle cap.

study_design_info.masking: Quadruple (Participant, Care Provider, Investigator, Outcomes Assessor)

primary_outcome.measure: Subjects With Investigator Global Assessment (IGA) Success (IGA of 0 or 1) at End of Treatment (Day 7 or 14).
primary_outcome.description: IGA scored on scale of 0 (clear) to 4 (severe).

primary_outcome.measure: Number of Participants With Excellent Overall Safety Score at End of Treatment.
primary_outcome.description: The investigator will assess tolerance at Day 7 and Day 14 using an overall safety score of 0 to 3 defined as; Grade 0-No signs of irritation (excellent); Grade 1-Slight signs of irritation which resolved (Good); Grade 2-Clear signs of irritation (Fair); Grade 3-Patient discontinued due to irritation(Poor).

secondary_outcome.measure: Precent Reduction From Baseline for Scaling at End of Treatment.
secondary_outcome.time_frame: From Baseline to end of treatment (Day 7 or 14)
secondary_outcome.description: Scaling score on a scale of 0 (none) to 4 (severe).

secondary_outcome.measure: Percent Reduction From Baseline for Crusting at End of Treatment.
secondary_outcome.time_frame: From Baseline to end of treatment (Day 7 or 14)
secondary_outcome.description: Crusting scored on a scale of 0 (none) to 4 (severe).

secondary_outcome.measure: Percent Reduction From Baseline for Erythema at End of Treatment.
secondary_outcome.time_frame: From Baseline to end of treatment (Day 7 or 14)
secondary_outcome.description: Erythema scored on scale of 0 (none) to 4 (severe).

secondary_outcome.measure: Percent Reduction From Baseline for Oiliness at End of Treatment.
secondary_outcome.time_frame: From Baseline to end of treatment (Day 7 or 14)
secondary_outcome.description: Oiliness scored on a scale of 0 (none) to 4 (severe).

intervention.description: topical non steroidal cream, twice daily

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Clinical diagnosis of cradle cap
- Must be at least 30 days old
- Must be in good health as determined by investigator
- Naive to prior cradle cap therapy (may have used mineral, olive oils)
Exclusion Criteria:
- Known food, topical product or medicinal allergies.
- Prior use of corticosteroids, antifungals or keratolytics for Cradle Cap
- Weighing less than 7 lbs

group.title: Bland Emollient
group.description: Bland emollient : Eucerin cream twice daily

group.title: Promiseb Topical Cream
group.description: Promiseb Topical Cream : topical non steroidal cream, twice daily

group.title: Bland Emollient
group.description: Bland emollient : Eucerin cream twice daily

group.title: Promiseb Topical Cream
group.description: Promiseb Topical Cream : topical non steroidal cream, twice daily

outcome.title: Subjects With Investigator Global Assessment (IGA) Success (IGA of 0 or 1) at End of Treatment (Day 7 or 14).
outcome.description: IGA scored on scale of 0 (clear) to 4 (severe).
outcome.population: All subjects will data after baseline were included in the analysis. For the Bland emollient group, 2 subjects were excluded from the analysis. For the Promiseb group, 3 subjects were excluded and one of the subjects that did not complete the study was included with Day 7 data carried forward to impute missing Day 14 data.

certain_agreements.pi_employee: Principal Investigators are NOT employed by the organization sponsoring the study.
certain_agreements.restrictive_agreement: The only disclosure restriction on the PI is that the sponsor can review results communications prior to public release and can embargo communications regarding trial results for a period that is less than or equal to 60 days. The sponsor cannot require changes to the communication and cannot extend the embargo.

clinical_results.limitations_and_caveats: Small number of subjects enrolled and analyzed.
